Mechanism of action of Liraglutide in diabetes mellitus is

options.label: A
options.text: It is analogue of GLP released from gut and increase glucose dependent insulin secretion

options.label: B
options.text: It is DPP – 4 inhibitor and result in decreased breakdown of GLP

options.label: C
options.text: It inhibits SGLT – 2 and cause glucosuria

options.label: D
options.text: It is amylin analogue and decrease glucagon

questions.correct_answer: A. It is analogue of GLP released from gut and increase glucose dependent insulin secretion
